whoWeAre.title: WHO WE ARE
whoWeAre.content: We are a veteran Challenge Mode team, built by players who have mastered high-quality PvE/PvP content since the earliest competitive seasons. Our core stems from Realm-First, Speedrunning and Title-Level gameplay, with focus on Mistwalker+ level execution — never risky shortcuts.

ourTeam.title: OUR TEAM
points: A fixed roster of experienced CM specialists
Players with Platinum / Gold / Rank 1 history
Route planners, pull optimizers and cooldown specialists
Private, organized and consistent teams — no fillers
ourTeam.footer: Every service is handled internally by the same trusted core.

whatMakesUsDifferent.title: WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT
points: Clean pulls, controlled pace, no panic gameplay
Full knowledge of skips, timings and recovery scenarios
whatMakesUsDifferent.footer: Our goal is not just completion — it's perfection with safety.

rules.title: General Behavior
rules.description: Be respectful to everyone – no harassment, discrimination or drama. Open a ticket in #book-today FOR QUESTIONS.

rules.title: No Advertising
rules.description: No spamming, self-promotion or advertising outside of staff channels. Follow Discord Terms of Service.

rules.title: Direct Messages
rules.description: Do NOT reply to direct messages from people who are not staff, e.g. @Owner @Advertiser @Verified Booster.

rules.title: Boosting / CM Runs
rules.description: Only staff-approved boosts are allowed. Selfplay runs are conducted in VC channels.

rules.title: Security
rules.description: Do NOT share account credentials or private information! English is the language during all sessions!

api._comment: Not used for WoW boosting service
